p: Viruses rescued by reverse genetics were titrated and plaque-purified by plaque assay using Avicel 43 and agarose 44 overlays, respectively. Plaque-purified viruses were then amplified once in MDCK cells in DMEM supplemented with 1 μg/ml of TPCK-trypsin to constitute working stocks. Virus growth kinetics were performed at an m.o.i. of 10 −5 in MDCK cells and 10 −4 in A549 cells. Viral titres in clarified supernatants were determined at the different indicated time points post infection by plaque assay.
